title: Pets Welcome! Renovated 1 Bedroom 1 Bath W/ Washer & Dryer, Fireplace!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 659 Sq.
At Latitude Apartments, we offer spacious, beautifully designed, one and two bedroom homes featuring brand new interiors.

Our homes have sleek stainless steel appliances, rich dark wood European cabinetry, impressive wood grain flooring, plush high end carpeting, bright lighting, smooth satin nickel hardware, and warm paint colors.
With ample storage, cozy wood burning fireplaces, full sized washers/dryers, and over-sized patios and balconies, Latitude meets all your needs and more.
Latitude boasts mature landscaping and green space, convenient amenities, and helpful 24 hour maintenance, plus on site Courtesy Patrol nightly!

Centrally located near major employers such as Boeing and Swedish, and easy downtown access, restaurants, entertainment, and shopping at popular attractions such as Mill Creek Town Center and Alderwood/Everett malls, Latitude is the perfect location for you!
Schedule a personalized tour of Latitude today to discover how much better life can be!
- Outdoor Ping Pong Table and Corn Hole
Aggressive Breed and Exotic/Poisonous Restrictions Apply.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
